text: The Opéra Bastille (, "Bastille Opera House") is a modern opera house in the 12th arrondissement of Paris, France. It was opened in 1989 as part of President François Mitterrand's Grands Travaux. Patureau, Frédérique: le Palais Garnier dans la société parisienne (1875–1914). Liège: Mardaga, 1991, p. 393 sqq. It became the main facility of the Paris National Opera. ==References== Category:Opera houses in France
title: Opéra Bastille
